title: Do people actually genuinely think Diamond is trash level skill?
body:
Never thought I'd even make Platinum, however I surprised myself last season and got to Diamond 5
This puts me in the top 1.98% on the server. I think that's pretty decent.
Yet the majority of players I meet say "Diamond is trash ELO", "You're not good unless you're in master".
Is that just people trolling or is this actually the common mindset?
